column1: For when we accept that life is hard we will also realize that only through strength and character we have a chance of living a good life.
Dopamine is not about the pursuit of happiness but about the happiness of pursuit.
True happiness is not found in maximizing time spent in leisure activities. Rather it is a byproduct of voluntary efforts in the service of personal growth and meaningful goals.
Make your plan. Decide what kind of man you want to be. Develop the skills to be that man.
Do not sacrifice the thing you want for the thing that is supposed to get it.
To ask the right question is already half the solution of a problem.
I am not what happened to me, I am what I choose to become.
Try not to become a person of success. Rather try to become a person of value.
Success is getting what you want. Happiness is wanting what you get.
As soon as you trust yourself, you will know how to live.
Happiness is when what you think, what you say, and what you do are in harmony.
There is no path to happiness: happiness is the path.
Judge a man by his questions rather than by his answers.
Be the kind of guy who refuses to quit after failures.
Be the kind of guy who doesn't cut corners.
